page.title: 16A day in my life
page.content: I woke up at seven and had a shower. I had some cereal and a cup of tea. I then packed my bags and went to school. The first lesson was Maths and we did equations. It was then time for SPICE which stands for Solving Problems in Community and Environment. We learnt about the Domesday Project. We went out of school to study some farmland. I went home for lunch. After returning I had English, we did an essay. Economics came next and we went over our trip to a supermarket, Asda. At 3.50 we went home. I changed and did my homework. Then I had tea and went out to play football. After, I watched television and played a computer game. I was tired, so I had a wash and went to bed.
